settings.title: About us
settings.text: We believe injury does not define you but makes you stronger, physically, and mentally.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: o offer an extensive range of support products that empower everyday Australians to live their life unstoppable. We exist to prove that injuries don’t have to be a setback in your journey.

settings.heading: Trusted by Physios
settings.subheading: Only brand endorsed by Australian Physio Association

settings.heading: Exclusive Recovery Technology
settings.subheading: Clinically validated thermal material facilitates faster recovery

settings.title: A culture of innovation
settings.text: We are brave, we are progressive. We never stand still when it comes to continuous improvement to develop innovative ways to support EVERYBODY. Our exclusive thermal regulating fabrics, EXO™ and Trioxon® Advantage, release energy in the form of heat to enhance recovery. The first of its kind. It doesn’t stop there. We are determined to constantly evolve and innovate through not only the products we create, but our approach to everything we do.

settings.heading: Reducing Water with Dope Dyed Yarn
settings.subheading: Our dope dyed yarn process reduces manufacturing water usage by up to 90% whilst contributing to a reduction in energy consumption and water pollution.

settings.heading: Limestone Neoprene
settings.subheading: Utilising earth mined limestone to replace petrochemicals within the manufacturing process of our products.

settings.heading: Solvent- Free
settings.subheading: We use water-based glue in the lamination process of all of our products eliminating volatile organic compounds or VOCs.

settings.heading: Recycled Rubber foam
settings.subheading: Utilising ECO Carbon Black, a ‘green’ alternative made from recycled scrap rubber tires, for the rubber foam used thought-out all of our products.

settings.title: REDUCING OUR IMPACT
settings.description: We place great importance on our responsibility as a leading manufacturer of brace and support products. To do our part in minimising our impact, our solution-oriented approach focuses on waste, water, carbon, and chemistry and spans across every part of our business. Here are just some of the sustainable initiatives we have implemented to date:

settings.title: Share brand or product details
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: ﻿THE THERMOSKIN DIFFERENCE
settings.text:
This is great news for the millions of Australians who suffer from muscular pain and soft tissue injuries. The Thermal & EXO Thermoskin ranges are a game changer thanks to the introduction of thermo- regulating fabrics, that release energy in the form of heat. The EXO Range converts moisture into heat increasing muscle temperature and blood flow - both highly effective in aiding recovery of muscle pain and soft tissue injuries. Our Thermal Range allows for similar muscular recovery but utilises Thermal Trioxin Advantage Technology to draw the moisture away from the skin ensuring braces feel comfortable enough to be worn for longer periods of time. Our products incorporate the quality standard of world's best practice in materials, R&D,
manufacturing and distribution and will remain the benchmark of the industry. We will continue the evolution, as we focus on enhancements to the brand and maintain "quality thinking" processes at all times.
